keyEvents.title: Polar Tang Escapes from Marineford
keyEvents.description: Law's submarine successfully escapes Marineford while carrying the critically wounded Luffy and Jinbe, evading attacks from Admirals Kizaru and Aokiji.
keyEvents.significance: The submarine's escape ensures Luffy's survival after the devastating Marineford War.

keyEvents.title: Emergency Surgery Preparation
keyEvents.description: Inside the Polar Tang, Law prepares to perform emergency surgery on Luffy and Jinbe.
keyEvents.significance: The submarine serves as a mobile medical facility, highlighting Law's role as both pirate captain and doctor.

description: The Polar Tang is the submarine ship of the Heart Pirates, captained by Trafalgar Law. It is a yellow submarine capable of submerging to great depths to avoid detection and attacks.

keyEvents.title: Shanks Arrives at Marineford
keyEvents.description: Red-Haired Shanks and the entire Red Hair Pirates crew arrive at Marineford, dramatically changing the course of the war.
keyEvents.significance: Shanks' arrival at this location marks the turning point that ends the Marineford War.

keyEvents.title: Marineford War Officially Ends
keyEvents.description: Fleet Admiral Sengoku formally declares the end of the Marineford War at this location, marking the conclusion of one of the most devastating conflicts in One Piece history.
keyEvents.significance: The war's conclusion at Marineford reshapes the balance of power in the entire world.

description: Marineford is the former Marine Headquarters, site of the Paramount War. In this episode, it serves as the final battleground where Shanks arrives to end the conflict.
